api.technique.variationpoints.scalers package¶

Submodules¶

api.technique.variationpoints.scalers.scalers module¶

TODO

api.technique.variationpoints.scalers.scalers.global_scaling(matrices: [typing.Union[scipy.sparse.csr_matrix, numpy.ndarray]]) → [typing.Union[scipy.sparse.csr_matrix, numpy.ndarray]]¶

Scales the values of each matrix according to the min-max of all matrices given. :param matrices: set of matrices to scale :return: SimilarityMatrices after having been scaled globally.

api.technique.variationpoints.scalers.scalers.independent_scaling(matrices: [typing.Union[scipy.sparse.csr_matrix, numpy.ndarray]]) → [typing.Union[scipy.sparse.csr_matrix, numpy.ndarray]]¶

Returns the independent scaling of upper and lower matrices. :param matrices: list of matrices to scale :return: list of matrices each scaled to each respective matrix

api.technique.variationpoints.scalers.scalers.scale_with_technique(scaling_type: api.technique.variationpoints.scalers.scaling_method.ScalingMethod, matrices: [typing.Union[scipy.sparse.csr_matrix, numpy.ndarray]]) → [typing.Union[scipy.sparse.csr_matrix, numpy.ndarray]]¶

Scales given matrices using the specified scaling method. See paper for detailed description of the theory and details surrounding each scaling type :param scaling_type: the scaling method to perform on the matrices :param matrices: list of matrices in technique :return: list of SimilarityMatrix after being scaled
